fields.description: The public identifier for your Duo OIDC application. Get this from your Duo Admin Panel.
fields.label: Client ID

fields.description: A secret key for your OIDC app. Keep this confidential! Used to securely exchange tokens.
fields.label: Client Secret

fields.description: The URL where users are redirected to log in with Duo SSO. Starts the OIDC authentication flow.
fields.label: Authorization URL

fields.description: The URL your app uses to exchange the authorization code for access and ID tokens.
fields.label: Token URL

fields.description: The URL to fetch information (like email address) about the authenticated user. Use access token.
fields.label: UserInfo URL

fields.description: The URL Duo will redirect the user to after authentication. Must match the value registered in Duo. This should point to your ERPNext site’s OAuth callback endpoint.
fields.label: Redirect URI
